saao/saa15/P334857
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU i-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qa-bi ma-a mi-i-nu ṭe₃-mu ša LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} ina KUR-u₂ {URU}bu-ra-a-ti šu-u₂ la u₂-na-me-sa ina ŠA₃-bi-ma šu-u₂ x x x+x LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ x x x x x x x ma-a x x x x x x x-a-ši x x x x x x ša KUR-aš-šur x x x x+x i-za-qu-pu-up x x x x x-u a-na EN.NUN x x x x x+x-bu e-tar-ba x x x x x x+x mu x x
